column1: Sloth: Build a path of least resistance that leads users where you want them to go
Envy: Create a culture around your product and feed aspirational desires
Gluttony: Escalate customer’s commitment and use loss aversion to keep them there
Greed: Keep customers engaged by reinforcing the behaviours you desire
Lust: Turn desire into commitment by using emotion to defeat rational behaviour
Anger: Understand the power of metaphysical arguments and anonymity
Pride: Use Social Proof to position your product in line with your customers values
